parameters.query:
WITH recent_data AS (
  SELECT 
    date,
    page,
    query,
    clicks,
    impressions,
    SAFE_DIVIDE(clicks, impressions) * 100 as ctr,
    position,
    country,
    device
  FROM `{{ $env.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}.searchconsole.searchdata_site_impression`
  WHERE date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
    AND date <= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
),
page_performance AS (
  SELECT 
    page,
    SUM(clicks) as total_clicks,
    SUM(impressions) as total_impressions,
    SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(clicks), SUM(impressions)) * 100 as avg_ctr,
    AVG(position) as avg_position,
    COUNT(DISTINCT query) as keyword_count,
    DATE_DIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), MAX(date), DAY) as days_since_last_data
  FROM recent_data
  GROUP BY page
),
traffic_trends AS (
  SELECT 
    page,
    DATE_TRUNC(date, WEEK) as week,
    SUM(clicks) as weekly_clicks,
    SUM(impressions) as weekly_impressions
  FROM recent_data
  GROUP BY page, week
),
weekly_comparison AS (
  SELECT 
    page,
    LAG(weekly_clicks, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY page ORDER BY week) as prev_week_clicks,
    weekly_clicks as current_week_clicks,
    SAFE_DIVIDE(weekly_clicks - LAG(weekly_clicks, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY page ORDER BY week), LAG(weekly_clicks, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY page ORDER BY week)) * 100 as click_change_percent
  FROM traffic_trends
  WHERE week = DATE_TRUNC(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), WEEK)
)
SELECT 
  pp.page,
  pp.total_clicks,
  pp.total_impressions,
  pp.avg_ctr,
  pp.avg_position,
  pp.keyword_count,
  pp.days_since_last_data,
  wc.click_change_percent,
  CASE 
    WHEN wc.click_change_percent < -20 THEN 'traffic_drop'
    WHEN wc.click_change_percent > 20 THEN 'traffic_surge'
    WHEN pp.avg_ctr < 2 AND pp.total_impressions > 1000 THEN 'low_ctr'
    WHEN pp.avg_position > 10 AND pp.total_impressions > 500 THEN 'low_position'
    WHEN pp.days_since_last_data > 7 THEN 'potential_deindex'
    ELSE 'normal'
  END as alert_type
FROM page_performance pp
LEFT JOIN weekly_comparison wc ON pp.page = wc.page
ORDER BY pp.total_clicks DESC
LIMIT 100

WITH indexed_pages AS (
  SELECT 
    page_url,
    last_crawl_time,
    coverage_state,
    is_excluded,
    DATE_DIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DATE(last_crawl_time), DAY) as days_since_crawl
  FROM `{{ $env.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}.searchconsole.crawl_stats`
  WHERE DATE(last_crawl_time) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY)
),
indexing_changes AS (
  SELECT 
    page_url,
    coverage_state,
    is_excluded,
    days_since_crawl,
    CASE 
      WHEN is_excluded = FALSE AND coverage_state = 'Valid' THEN 'newly_indexed'
      WHEN is_excluded = TRUE OR coverage_state != 'Valid' THEN 'deindexed'
      WHEN days_since_crawl > 7 THEN 'crawl_issue'
      ELSE 'normal'
    END as indexing_status
  FROM indexed_pages
)
SELECT 
  page_url,
  coverage_state,
  is_excluded,
  days_since_crawl,
  indexing_status,
  COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY indexing_status) as status_count
FROM indexing_changes
WHERE indexing_status != 'normal'
ORDER BY days_since_crawl DESC
LIMIT 50

parameters.name: messages
parameters.value:
=[{
